Welcome to the **unofficial** Website for Statistics for Business Administration.

Here you can find an overview over most of the formulas that are provided in the lecture together with explanations and examples.

_Note:_ This website is a Work-In-Progress. If you feel like something is missing [tell us](https://github.com/Leoniepopken/SBA/issues), write us via WhatsApp or add it yourself!
